StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You're browsing through the intimates section when you come across a vibrator sale. "Super deluxe vibrators! Buy two get one free! Limited time offer!" This gets you thinking, and you come up with a way to get an even better vibrator, for free!
StaticSkill.Description: Regardless of your sex, a vibrator is a useful thing to have around. This spell transforms its target into a soul powered vibrator.
